turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Aki-Nagatsuka Station.
turn.1: What is the difference between Aki-Nagatsuka Station and other nearby stations?
turn.2: Aki-Nagatsuka Station Aki-Nagatsuka Station features two narrow side platforms serving two tracks.
turn.3: Is there a reason why there are two side platforms?
turn.4: The station initially had one island platform, but a new side platform serving bound trains was opened on November 28, 2015.
turn.5: What happened to the old platform?
turn.6: After the opening of the new side platform, the old island platform was converted to serve only bound trains, and was fenced off from the bound track.
turn.7: Is there any other interesting information I should know?
turn.8: The station building is located north-west of the platforms, and is shaped like an octagon.
turn.9: Is there anything else I should know?
turn.10: A railway crossing connects the bound platform to the station building.
turn.12: The station is manned and features automated ticket machines as well.
